title: Ep 69: Family fun time GONE WRONG
description:
Thanks to MyBookie for sponsoring the show!  Use this link to get in on the action, today! https://bit.ly/JUDGIES    In this Episode:  A man wonders if he is the A-hole for confronting his grandma, a guy pulls a hilarious prank on his friend, a woman feels guilty about asking for a little reciprocation,  and some listeners give us some treatment with their stories about family fun time gone wrong and bedroom fun time gone wrong.  Josh also introduces a hit new game show!                      Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!  https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod                        Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)  P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350                            Leave a Review!  https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238                Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod               Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod                 Intro Music by: Iván  https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
